channel.title: [Diploma Project] The Demonata [Diploma Project]
channel.description:
[center][u]I am currently taking the ICT Diploma here at my school, and as part of the course we have to do an independant project (or a group of 3 of us, in our case).
For our project we a designing a Runescape Private Server. BUT, we are'nt the best programmers here to do with RSPS' so i am creating this post to be able to ask for help, improvements, tips, and to keep up to date with our project.
We hope that you can help guide us in the creation of this project so that we can pass our diploma, and yes, you moparscapers will get credit for your help.[/u][/center][center]Thank You [/center][center]_________________________________________________________________________________[/center][center][u]The Demonata[/u][/center][center]Our Progress So Far[/center][center]This project started today. So not much has been achieved yet. Although so far we have created a temporary home:
[img]http://img69.imageshack.us/img69/663/homekc.jpg[/img][/center]
The next step we hope to achieve is to add a button in the emote tab to teleport us to another location, and to make the user spawn here when they first log in.
~ABTEKK
